Recording of recent SIG webinar you attended Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Attendee}}, Thank you for attending the webinar, “Why Your Company Can't Afford to Get Independent Contractor Engagement Wrong,” presented by MBO Enterprise Solutions and hosted by the Sourcing Interests Group. We hope you found the event engaging and relevant.
Following the event, several attendees requested a recording of the webinar and more information related to independent contractor trends. Below you will find a link to the recording and some additional educational information.
• Access a recording of the webinar by clicking here <https://sourcinginterests.webex.com/sourcinginterests/lsr.php?AT=pb&SP=EC&rID=6012567&rKey=9569ce5dd7559b37>. • MBO’s State of Independence in America <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/> report, which includes year-over-year analysis of the Independent Workforce Index. • A link to an article on the Association of Corporate Counsel web site, Top Ten Ways to Determine If You Have an Independent Contractor Compliance Issue: Understanding and Recognizing Misclassification Risk.
On behalf of SIG and the MBO, thank you for your time and interest in this important topic. Please consider us as a resource available to you for anything related to independent contractor compliance and engagement.
Best regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Taggart Account Executive, Enterprise Solutions MBO Partners
